main event: A cigar-shaped, white object with red and green alternating lights was observed orbiting in the sky over Bakersfield, California in November 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as the size of a basketball.
The object's motion was described as orbiting, with an indefinite shape.
The observation lasted for approximately one hour.
The observers were initially looking for Sputnik in the sky.
The weather conditions were overcast with calm winds.
sighted object: a cigar-shaped, white object with red and green alternating lights
